song.title: Relation Theory
song.info:
Relation Theory a co-op tune between Chuck Biscuits and Ozone
Originally finished in september 1995 for a Heretics intro called "Two" and released in october 1996 under the Kosmic Free Music Foundation. Tested fine in IT, CapaMod and Mod4Win. DO NOT PLAY in Cubic!: the volume slides are completely incorrect.
25.10.96
